title: SFR10
author: SFR10
content: While I was searching for MCNs earlier, I stumbled upon a "post" that mentioned there's one that has Bitcoin as one of its payment methods: AIR Creators Ecosystem [or Air Media-Tech]I was wondering if anyone from here has any experience with them.- It has a few mixed reviews on Trustpilot and Reddit, but there's no way of knowing which one is real or not!If someone else [preferably not newbies] knows about another MCN that also pays with Bitcoin, please mention their name here.
